ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Gerard C. Hawco** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. GERARD C. HAWCO, a Judge of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta, effective July 31, 2017.
